metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20854 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.20.drivers/phy/mscc/phy-ocelot-serdes.c has an off-by-one error with aresultant ctrl->phys out-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
